text: Brian Weir Henderson AM (15 September 1931 â€“ 5 August 2021) was a New Zealand- born Australian radio and television personality. He was known for his work with Nine Network in Australia. He worked as a television news anchor for Nine Network. He was a presenter and as host of Bandstand. Henderson was born in Dunedin, New Zealand. Henderson was diagnosed with kidney cancer in February 2020. He died on 5 August 2021 from the disease, aged 89.9news.com, 5 August 2021. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian radio personalities Category:Television news anchors Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:New Zealand television presenters
title: Brian Henderson (television presenter)
